name: Andrew Hopper
content: Andy Hopper's Home Page Andy Hopper Bio CV Sir Andy Hopper, CBE, FIET, FREng, FRS Department of Computer Science and Technology University of Cambridge JJ Thomson Avenue Cambridge,  CB3 0FD,  UK T: +44 1223 763500 (switchboard) E: ah12 [at] cam.ac.uk Professor Emeritus of Computer Technology: Department of Computer Science and Technology Commissioner: Royal Commission for the Exhibition of 1851 Chairman: lowRISC CIC, CommonAI CIC Aims: Digital Commons, National Digital Service, NewLabs
